title: How to Make a Royal Flush Drink

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour the whiskey into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the peach schnapps into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the raspberry liquor into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the cranberry juice into the cocktail shaker.

text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.  Pour the whiskey into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the peach schnapps into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the raspberry liquor into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the cranberry juice into the cocktail shaker.  Shake well.  Strain into a glass.  Enjoy your Royal Flush Drink.
